description: SuperStrand LT styles are the best down alternative for four-season warmth. This collection features a unique quilt pattern that reduces stitching, creating an uninterrupted flow of insulation and warmth. VerticalX™ SuperStrand insulation and windproof nylon fabric combine to provide OR's best warmth-to-weight layering package.
name: Outdoor Research SuperStrand LT Hoodie - Mens
